attributes.description:
Dynamite comes in small packages!

Like its predecessors, the new Jimny remains a small, lightweight 4WD vehicle. Its unique dimensions mean the Jimny can manoeuvre where larger vehicles don’t dare to go. Its light weight keeps it going strong over mud, through sand, and up steep slippery slopes where heavier vehicles tend to get stuck. Be the envy of them all in your new car! 

All trade ins are welcomed. In house finance is available. Nationwide delivery can be arranged.

attributes.description:
2010 Mercedes-Benz B200 Turbo Automatic for sale. Beautifully kept with loads of space and performance for the entire family.
Standard Features: ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Alloy Wheels | Automatic | Auxiliary Audio Input | Central Locking | Climate Control | EBD Electronic Brake Distribution | Electric Windows | Multi-Function Steering | Power Steering | Radio/CD,USB Input |
Car has full service history and spare key.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee.
Warranty options are available.

Mercedes-Benz B200 Turbo Automatic 
Power -  142 kW @ 5000 rpm
Torque -  280 Nm @ 1800 rpm
Economy - 7.7 l/100km
